donor_name: OFFICE OF THE HIGH COMMISSIONER FOR HUMA
United Nations Office of Project Services
outputs.output_descr: Human Rights Adviser will focus on (1) monitoring and reporting to the Resident Coordinator and OHCHR on the overall human rights situation in Serbia; (2) supporting UN human rights treaty body and special procedures mechanisms in Serbia; (3) supporting UN and national NGO transitional justice initiatives; (4) support activities for human rights promotion and education; and (5) providing general human rights advice and support to UNRC and UNCT.

project_descr: Support to the Office of the Resident Coordinator
project_title: Support to the Office of the Resident Coordinator
